column5: ATRS hey management great buying opportunity
ATRS this is what we get when management of a company sells shares instead of buying shares to build confidence
ATRS seems like thats the overall consensus here

ATRS getting down to the last days to make your voice be heard make sure you guys VOTE against the board reelection and the executive compensation package if you are in the philly area grab your pitchforks and give them hell at the ASM

ATRS a few years back when this junk was AIS someone asked Cramer about it and he said stay away this is a device company and as such it only has so much potential I didnt listen and sold all my ACAD shares for 130 and bought this junk Look at ACAD now it even went up to 50 With this junk we are lucky to see 3 againi have been holding for many many yearsWe cannot expect much from this junk Always going down BTW all excuses have been used why this goes down here are some examples sky is blue the market is downThe market is up too much today isnt Tuesday lets see what else We just have to accept this is a 2 cylinder engine and we cannot expect it to performLike an eight cylinder powerhouseJunk is junk no way to dress it up thats why no one is trusting the company and the management
